# Contributing to Podcast Manager

We welcome contributions from the community to improve the Podcast Manager. By participating, you agree to abide by these guidelines.

## How to Contribute

1. Fork the repository and create a new branch for your contribution.

2. Make your changes and commit them with descriptive messages.

3. Push your changes to your forked repository.

4. Submit a pull request (PR) to the `main` branch of the original repository.

5. Your PR will be reviewed by the maintainers. Make any necessary changes based on feedback.

6. Once your PR is approved, it will be merged into the main repository.

## Code Guidelines

- Follow the existing code style and conventions.
- Provide clear and concise commit messages.
- Keep changes focused and avoid unrelated changes in a single PR.

## Report Issues

If you encounter bugs, have feature requests, or want to suggest improvements, please contact the project maintainers.

## Help Others

You can also contribute by helping others with their issues, providing feedback, or participating in discussions.

Thank you for your contributions!

By participating in this project, you agree to abide by the [Code of Conduct](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md).
